description.synopsis: A romantic action film directed by Triekoti Peta, starring Ranjith and Palak Lalwani in the lead roles.
A heroine-centric film which focuses on three women characters played by Kajal Aggarwal, Nithya Menen, and Regina Cassandra.
A horror film directed by Shankar, starring Meka Srikanth and Naziya in the lead roles.
A romantic film directed by Venky Atluri, starring Raashi Khanna and Varun Tej in the lead roles.
When the city of "Tiruppuram" gets divided amongst the inhabitants, a boy and girl from these territories fall in love with each other despite the societal obstructions.
A thriller drama film directed by G Ashok, starring Anushka Shetty in the lead role.
When a careless recovery agent and a fashion designer become part of a big Bollywood event in New York, consequences follow them.
After the death of his father, the King of Wakanda, returns home to an isolated, technologically advanced African nation to succeed to the throne and take his rightful place as king.
The war between bromance and romance.

Set in medieval India, a legendary Hindu Rajput queen Padmavat, is said to have committed jauhar along with all the other women of the city to protect their honor and to avoid being captured by the ruthless and powerful Sultan Alauddin Khilji.
Based on the life of Tamil Nadu activist Arunachalam Muruganantham, who aimed to provide sanitary napkins to poor women in rural areas.
A ride through the dark underbelly of the underworld and their clash against the police.
A gynecologist, party animal and ladies man by heart meets a homely girl for marriage but things take a turn for the worse when they both get to know each other better.
Five ladies enjoy their life to the fullest while their husbands go out of town.
A romantic film directed by Mallikarjun Muthalageri, starring Sreejith, and Tanvi Rao in the lead roles.
A drama film directed by MA Nishad, starring Jaya Prada, Revathi, Pasupathy Ramasaamy, R Parthiban and Joy Mathew in the lead roles.
A police officer on a mission to uncover the truth of a young man who is accused of assaulting his girlfriend.
Two journalists working for two different channels under certain circumstances come together to cover a live war.
An ex-minister is trying to get back his laptop from an auditor who blackmails him and demands Rs. 10 crores to return the laptop.
A highly ambitious village boy who is constantly trying to understand what life is, goes out of his village to achieve his dreams.
A Chicago-based doctor turns into a ruthless vigilante when his wife is murdered and his daughter is brutally attacked by thugs.
A horror thriller film directed by Prosit Roy, starring Anushka Sharma and Parambrata Chatterjee in the lead roles.
A group of ghost hunters visits an island where they come across some strange powers.
